WorkItem.Description:
HtmlNode.CopyFrom(HtmlNode node, bool deep) documentation for parameter "deep" sais: 
 
"true to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node, false to clone only the node itself."
 
However, it works the other way around: 
true => shallow copy
false => deep copy.
 
Perhaps you should just change the parameter name to "shallow": would not break the code that is potentially already using this.
WorkItem.Summary: HtmlNode.CopyFrom deep parameter works the opposite
